create_secret_jsx.APPNAME_will_store_your_keys: %(APPNAME)s extension will safely store your keys and password. They will be enciphered.
create_secret_jsx.please_create_secret: For that, you should come up with a secret phrase for the cipher. Secret phrase will not be stored anywhere.
create_secret_jsx.poor_secret: Your secret phrase should have at least 8 symbols, including 1-9 digits and Big Letters.
create_secret_jsx.too_long_secret: Your secret phrase is longer than 512 symbols.
create_secret_jsx.non_latin: Secret phrase should consist only of english letters.
create_secret_jsx.secrets_are_not_same: Secret phrases are not the same.

add_keys_jsx.and_your_password: ...and password or one of keys to save:
add_keys_jsx.it_is_a_password: It is your password. We will save posting, active and owner keys.
add_keys_jsx.memo: You entered memo-key, we are not currently support memo keys.

enter_secret_jsx.forgot_confirm: Are you sure you are forgot your secret phrase? We can remove all keys from Keychain, you should enter them all again.

main_jsx.lock_desc: Will shred keys and you should enter it again.

transfer_jsx.no_active: We are not storing your active-key. Please shred all keys and login again.
transfer_jsx.no_posting: We are not storing your posting-key. Please shred all keys and login again.

login_jsx.error: Your keychain is empty. Please fill it before using it to authorize in applications.
login_jsx.wants_your_nick: wants to know what is your name on Golos.

sign_jsx.missing_roles: It requires also keys which are not stored in keychain:

app_settings.to_save_click_button: Click Save button in order to apply settings.
